committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels

official_title: A bill to amend the Energy Security Act to provide for funding by the Synthetic Fuels Corporation for projects which will demonstrate the technical and feasibility of new technologies for the commercial production of synthetic fuel in addition to projects solely for the commercial production of such fuels.
short_title: Synthetic Fuels Pilot Plant Act of 1981

summary.text: Synthetic Fuels Pilot Plant Act of 1981 - Amends the Energy Security Act: (1) to require the Synthetic Fuels Corporation, in establishing a comprehensive strategy to achieve the national synthetic fuel production goal established under such Act, to consider new synthetic fuel technologies requiring demonstration of their technical and economic feasibility; and (2) to provide for the funding of projects to demonstrate the feasibility of such technologies.

titles.title: Synthetic Fuels Pilot Plant Act of 1981

A bill to amend the Energy Security Act to provide for funding by the Synthetic Fuels Corporation for projects which will demonstrate the technical and feasibility of new technologies for the commercial production of synthetic fuel in addition to projects solely for the commercial production of such fuels.
